body:
We ran the benchmarks, and added benchmarks for rendering 1, 10, and 100 partials directly by object. The results show no significant difference.

See `branch_test.rb` on https://github.com/Casecommons/rails-simple-benches/tree/to_path_benchmarks (52f7770) for the modified suite.

```
master (704ee0d):
 overhead index template_1 partial_1 partial_1_object partial_10 partial_10_object coll_10 partial_100 partial_100_object coll_100 uniq_100 diff_100
      137   261        312       303              344        996               973     458        7125               7042     2021     2122     4291
      136   256        302       290              363        947               970     451        7056               7012     2051     2117     4211
      139   257        309       294              340        932               969     451        6872               6972     2032     2119     4336
      135   256        303       293              341        932               974     452        6828               6851     1982     2016     4189
      151   265        312       294              339        923               939     451        6767               6831     1968     2031     4248

to_path (6d18262):
 overhead index template_1 partial_1 partial_1_object partial_10 partial_10_object coll_10 partial_100 partial_100_object coll_100 uniq_100 diff_100
      133   250        305       292              349        903               945     459        6590               6728     1904     1994     4043
      133   248        297       284              348        897               941     434        6613               6626     1872     1974     4050
      132   241        293       281              346        895               929     436        6480               6625     1877     1973     4065
      133   253        299       310              328        926               946     448        6609               6680     1888     1992     4105
      133   246        289       287              346        926               927     426        6839               6640     1883     1981     4050
```
